verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [ARG1: that his administration is taking “ sweeping action ” to lower the price of prescription drugs in the U.S. through his “ Blueprint to Lower Drug Prices] . ”

President Donald Trump announced Friday that his administration [V: is] taking “ sweeping action ” to lower the price of prescription drugs in the U.S. through his “ Blueprint to Lower Drug Prices . ”

President Donald Trump announced Friday that [ARG0: his administration] is [V: taking] [ARG1: “ sweeping action ”] [ARGM-PRP: to lower the price of prescription drugs in the U.S. through his “ Blueprint to Lower Drug Prices] . ”

President Donald Trump announced Friday that [ARG0: his administration] is taking “ sweeping action ” to [V: lower] [ARG1: the price of prescription drugs] [ARGM-LOC: in the U.S.] [ARGM-MNR: through his “ Blueprint to Lower Drug Prices] . ”
